intro: Hormidium sessiliflorum, commonly known as the sessile-flowered hormidium, is a species of flowering plant native to the arid regions of southern Africa. Hormidium sessiliflorum is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and drought tolerance.
